Class BufferingLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mnl.osgi.lf4osgi.core.BufferingLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logger
    public class BufferingLogger
extends Object
implements Logger
    A logger that logs to a buffer.
